website_summaries.verdict: Several attachments can be used to convert this leaf blower into a sweeper and cleaner backed by a 120 mph air blast.
pros: Boasts the ability to create a "cleanzone" around your home using the attachments and different modes
Gets into difficult to reach areas
Use to clear leaves, driveway, workshops, dry automobiles and other uses
Air speed reaches 120 mph with 80 cfm airflow
8 attachments included for use with clean-up, inflating  and deflating, among other uses

customer_reviews.title: Poor experience, I would like a replacement or my money back.
customer_reviews.text: Out of the box the battery was charged, unit did very well. Two weeks later I had recharged the battery and took it to the leaves. Big problem is that it would only work for three seconds before it stopped blowing. Retried over Thanksgiving holiday and after three day charge it did the same thing, three seconds on and then off again.
customer_reviews.author: texasfan

customer_reviews.title: great surprise
customer_reviews.text: This blower surprised the heck out of me. I was not expecting to get the performance i received from this product, its perfect for blowing the driveway and sidewalk after mowing the lawn and it even works good drying the car . The battery won't give you much time(about 12 min) so I bought a aftermarket double capacity battery and now i have a total of 45 minutes of run time. I'm not sure how well this blower will blowing large piles of leafs but for my usage its perfect
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT PURCHASE :  WORX WG545 1 WORXAIR
customer_reviews.text: The Battery lasts about 3 minutes. I contacted WORX about this issue and their Customer Service Response was that 3 minutes was normal battery time on this product....???? Where in their commerical advertising does WORX reveal this? The answer is : They Do Not.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Purchased to dry luxury vehicle
customer_reviews.text: After washing my car, I use this blower instead of towels which is can cause hairline swirl marks. The flat attachment is perfect for blowing droplets off of your vehicle & features rubber at the the exhaust to protect your car. As a leaf blower, it's relatively weak when compared to the Workx WG546 Turbine. For blowing dust out of the garage instead of sweeping, it does the job. Note: You'll need to get another battery if you want to use for more than 10 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: chi

customer_reviews.title: The first time I used it I was happy. Not very powerful
customer_reviews.text: The first time I used it I was happy. Not very powerful, but very convenient. The second time I used it the battery stopped after only about 2 minutes. From there it was downhill. The last time I used it I was getting about 30 seconds to a minute on a charge. I did not overcharge the battery. The return period had expired by the time I had decided that it was not what I expected. Now I essentially have a brick. Not sure whether to pursue a battery replacement or trash the thing. Disappointing. I expected much better.
customer_reviews.author: Bryson

customer_reviews.title: wish it worxed
customer_reviews.text: Works ok when it worked for 2 weeks. Now it runs for about 5 seconds and then cuts off. Contact manufacture and they replace battery... still same problem.... boo
customer_reviews.author: BrandonNco

customer_reviews.title: This product worked great at first and went downhill from then on
customer_reviews.text: This product worked great at first and went downhill from then on. The battery doesnt hold a charge and its only good for about 15 minutes! I regret investing in this product and would never suggest anyone to buy it unless they want to be disappointed. Its to late to return so now im stuck with something that doesnt work... never again ....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great for light jobs!
customer_reviews.text: Please be aware that even a mild breeze will be a major contender when blowing leaves off your patio, porch or driveway. However, to be free from an electrical extension cord is simply awesome. The run time is about 15 - 20 minutes running it all the time. However, I've used it at least 6 times in small time durations without having to recharge it. My 5 star review is based on blowing leaves and other debris, sturdy construction, weight, ease of use, and a competitive retail price. I have yet nor any inkling to try any of the accessories included in the kit. :)
customer_reviews.author: squinja7000

customer_reviews.title: Super light weight. Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Bought the 20v for my 83yo mother. Wanted no cord and light weight. This fits the bill perfectly. Tried it out and did my porches and drive along with blowing out the shop. Ran it until the battery shut off after about 15-20 minutes. Did fine for general leave blowing. Bottom line - works great. Not a hurricane but good enough for day to day tasks. Big plus for me it is super light and convenient because you don’t have the hassles of a dang extension cord! I ordered the 32 v for my self.
customer_reviews.author: WILLIAM ALLEN

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Light duty only but has sufficient power for small jobs. Purchased because I already have a Worx electric chain saw and wanted to be able to “share” batteries. Battery sent with this blower was same size but clearly a cheaper model. My chain saw battery has a “charge level” indicator on the front, which the manual on the blower indicates is there but is not. Don’t buy if your adding to your collection of Worx battery share tools. Really a disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's rated at 120 mile an hour blower.
customer_reviews.text: Yes you can buy an electric or gas blower that has much more velocity. This works great for our RV patio and getting stuff off of the roof and slide outs. I also use this to dry my truck after washing. It's nice not to have a cord or use fuel. I recommend buying an extra battery in case you need a bit more use time. Great blower for a battery operated unit. Very happy I bought this.
customer_reviews.author: Bharnz1

customer_reviews.title: Good for small things
customer_reviews.text: Good for small things like blowing out the garage or front porch, will not really blow leaves off grass but great for driveways and sidewalks. The dryer part is a stretch, doesn't really work but that is not why I bought it. I love it for blowing the leaves and other debris out of me garage and my front porch, if this is what you want to do it is great if you want to blow the leaves off the yard then no,,,,
customer_reviews.author: Philip Yeatts

customer_reviews.title: This is what you need for a deck or patio
customer_reviews.text: This is a very light, (3 pounds) but powerful machine that beats a broom any day. We have a very large patio and it cleans the leaves and debris off in just a few minutes. Used the flat drying attachment to clean our two tables of water and this is another plus for this blower. Tried the hose and brush attachment and it gets those cobwebs and buildup out of the corners of your outside with ease. Have not tried the inflator or deflator, so can't comment on those, but since the rest of the tool works great expect nothing less from them. I would recommend this to anyone looking for a hard surface blower.
customer_reviews.author: T.R.P.C.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this blower! I've only used it once, but it was super light which was very important to me & it blows. It might be a small thing, but when the battery is juiced up it blows. It cleaned my entire garage floor & driveway. I was amazed how well it did it & it also is a car vacuum which was a life savor b/c I had to carry mulch & soil in the back for my flowerbeds & it was a mess, this puppy cleaned it right up! Yes it's a little more expensive than the others, but boy did it do it's job!
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Expandable and flexible
customer_reviews.text: I use this and an additional set of extensions to clean my gutters that are over 20 feet up. It is now a one-man job. The blower is surprisingly effective on dry debris in the gutter and lasts long enough on one charge to do the entire 44 foot length. I have not tried all the attachments, but do use the blower for quick cleanups around the garage and porches. No problem with charging or battery life so far so I have put off buying a second battery for now.
customer_reviews.author: Artee

customer_reviews.title: It is perfect for me
customer_reviews.text: This is a great tool for me. It may not be the most powerful but it is perfect for blowing the deck and stairs off. I use it to keep my garage clean. It is light and easy to swing without needing straps to hold it. The battery life is good but I did buy an extra battery because I use it for so many little jobs. I also bought all the tools that went with it and they are handy.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customersandy

customer_reviews.title: Does its job.
customer_reviews.text: I like this blower. I certainly didn't expect the same power as a gas blower. For simple blowing jobs like a little grass after mowing it works great. On a full battery charge, I get about 20-30 minutes out of it. I like all the attachments for all the "extra" tasks it can do. I have a Worx trimmer as well so having all the same batteries is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Power?????
customer_reviews.text: Not a whole lot of power for blowing anything heavier than dry leaves in a small area. Maybe the larger voltage unit would be better, but did not notice if it was an option. I don’t need all the attachments but in order to buy blower, it comes with them which I’m paying for. On the upside, it’s super light weight...I checked out the Black and Decker cordless blower (HM DEPOT)and it is uber cheap...battery eject, on/off switch, cheap plastic. Have kept for quick pine needle removal on my porch.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: Works great for small jobs
customer_reviews.text: Does what it is designed for. I have both gas and electric lawn blowers which are much more powerful but wanted this for smaller jobs like clearing off my deck. Worked great for that as well as clearing leaves and dirt out of my garage. Not super powerful but I did not expect it to be. Battery lasted just shy of 1/2 hour. Light weight and easy to handle. Lower power is actually a plus as you get a more targeted airflow.
customer_reviews.author: LY

customer_reviews.title: I'm a 67 year old female and love this light weight
customer_reviews.text: I'm a 67 year old female and love this light weight, useful leaf blower. It allows me to remove leaf debris and dirt from my entry ways any time I want without connecting my larger blower to an extension cord. It is true, it can't blow heavy weight like a thick clump of newly mown grass off the top of grass. It also has limited battery life, but it is enough to accomodate my modest requirements. It also quickly recharges. This is perfect for smaller tasks and shouldn't be expected to do heavier tasks. It also comes with an array of attachments and can be used to vacuum to some degree although I have not used this feature.
customer_reviews.author: Busy Lizzie

customer_reviews.title: I am so happy with this
customer_reviews.text: Don't worry about all the negative reviews...I am so happy with this. OK, the runing time is not too long...about 15 to 20 minutes, but it blows well and is so much better than raking leaves. Easy to charge and load the battery. Even has blown wet leaves well. Powerful enough for steps, deck, porch, driveway, etc. maybe not the best for a large yard.
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: Love It
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight, easy to use and very convenient. I live in a townhouse with a small backyard and even smaller frontyard. This tool is perfect for quick clean ups. This model doesn't have the mounting bracket, but is light enough to hang on a utility hook.
customer_reviews.author: Dubliner

customer_reviews.title: Not good on any level
customer_reviews.text: Got the product, charged the battery and it ran less than 60 seconds. Air stream was not powerful at all even at the beginning. I thought I would try to charge the battery again, each time I charged it overnight. This time the blower only ran about 15 seconds. Yes, seconds, not minutes. I bought it through Amazon so returning it was fairly easy. Would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Subaru Dave

customer_reviews.title: Rip Off - Do Not Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Does not live up to any of the hype. Under powered and battery has a very short life. Do not purchase this product. We got it to remove pine needles from our gutters and the blower does not have enough power to do anything. Would have returned the product if it was not for my wife throwing away the box after opening. Would gift this product to someone if I was going to give a gift to someone I did not like. To bad that is not the case.
customer_reviews.author: JimmyO

customer_reviews.title: Cool little blower
customer_reviews.text: I am a bus driver and have to constantly sweep out the bus because kids eat in it and leave crackers, chips, cookie crumps and track in grass and dirt. Sweeping is difficult because there are so many legs on the 26 seats to sweep around. This small blower works great. It's lightweight and I can get it under the seats to blow in hard to get places.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. G

customer_reviews.title: Multiple defective products
customer_reviews.text: It’s does not work for more than a few seconds. It’s a shame that they’re selling these things to the public like this knowing they’re defective. And after research I found that a lot more people have the exact same issue with these by not turning on for more than 30 seconds or a minute and turn them back off.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Be cautious buying this product
customer_reviews.text: Product description WG545 is provided with a120V lithium battery. Description in my opinion not entirely truthful. Takes approx. 5 hrs. to charge the battery. When fully charged and blower is used the blower operates up to 10 minutes max. before battery requires recharging.
customer_reviews.author: ed s

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for light cleanup around the garage and driveway / yard post lawn mowing
customer_reviews.text: I have the batteries I cycle for trimming and blowing grad party mow, love cutting the cord on my old blower. Sidenote - Wish this had a bag for the vacuum - seems pointless without one. Blower awesome, not sure how this could be used in the car unfortunately with out a vacuum bag...
customer_reviews.author: Riah Constantine

customer_reviews.title: Average at best.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I saw the Infomercial on television. I do not think that it works as well as the one I saw demonstrated. (Do they ever?) That said, it is light and handy, I use it rather than dragging out my much larger corded blower. I most likely would not have bought this blower if I had seen an actual demonstration, The battery does not last very long before needing a recharge. I have not looked into a spare battery or a larger battery.
customer_reviews.author: K. Harris

customer_reviews.title: Love my blower!
customer_reviews.text: Best tool I ever bought! I can handle it with ease (I am not a big woman, nor strong) and it has enough power for clearing off my deck, patio and sidewalk. This does not have the power for moving piles of leaves, but it is small and lightweight, which is fantastic for the daily and weekly chores of maintaining!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: A Great Little Blower
customer_reviews.text: Light weight, yet produces a strong air flow to move leaves, dust, and light debris. Really handy to do quick clean ups on the patio. In the garden it's effective in blowing leaves and such out of the beds. Battery life has been good for quick clean ups.
customer_reviews.author: Clayton M. Kirkland

customer_reviews.title: Not one of the best Blower but good for the price
customer_reviews.text: I use this one for backyard and front yard removal of grass after lawn mowing. It runs on battery and battery can last for 15 to 16 minutes of continuous use. Light weighted. Easy to carry and work. Very powerful motor. This one comes with many attachments. Also, a battery can be interchangeable with other battery operated devices from the Wrox. Overall satisfied with the product. battery charging takes around 2 to 2.5 hours after a full discharge.
customer_reviews.author: Kshah

customer_reviews.title: WORX WG545.1 WORXAIR Lithium Multi-Purpose Blower/Sweeper/Cleaner, 20-volt...
customer_reviews.text: It losses it's charge too rapidly. Don't know if it has to do with heating up for a short time and just shuts down. I refer to both batteries. I can't get no more than 15-20 minutes the most. The worst part of the job is I'm unable to finish the task, till the batteries cool down to re-charge. Would you have any solutions for this issue????? I like the product, the way it handles when I use it. But the real problem is the WORX WA3520 20-Volt MAX Lithium Battery. The life span is 15-20 minutes as I mentioned above.
customer_reviews.author: Pablo Montalvo Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Small, lightweight
customer_reviews.text: If you’re hoping to blow leaves around with this, you’re going to be out of luck. It just isn’t powerful enough and the battery just doesn’t last long enough. But, that said, with all the different attachments, you should still be able to find a use for it. It’s good for blowing off driveways/sidewalks after mowing. I use it a lot in my wood shop to blow away sawdust. Overall, it’s good for small/lightweight work.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Miller

customer_reviews.title: EXTREMELY DISAPPOINTED
customer_reviews.text: I watched this infomercial - THOUGHT WOW - I WANT THAT.. ordered it - received it and could not wait to use it. Charged the battery for 24 hours. Put it in my car unused for 4 hours while I cleaned a property I was working on and went into the garage to "blow it out" within 15 min this unit kept shutting off - would not blow and I had to finish this clean out using the blow on my shop vac. I am EXTREMELY DISAPPOINTED.
customer_reviews.author: julianne Harris

customer_reviews.title: Wimpy level of power
customer_reviews.text: I had high expectations for this unit being a good combination of adequate power, without the hassle of having to pre-mix gas and oil. While the hassle factor elimination certainly has been achieved, the adequate power factor has not. Bear in mind that I'm using this blower only to clear grass from the edges of my driveway and sidewalk after I cut / edge the grass on a typical 0.5 acre suburban lot. It's performance is below adequate even in this non-taxing use. I realize that I took a risk going from a gas powered unit to this one, but given the speed / CFM specs published, I certainly expected more than this model delivers !!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ease of use...
customer_reviews.text: After reading the reviews I was a little hesitant about purchasing the blower.... however it arrived and way I went! It is light weight and has enough power for my needs.....battery length about the same length of time as my energy...about twenty minutes....very pleased with this product! Intend to buy the weed eater and hedge trimmer also....I now have three batteries so will not need to purchase any more of them!
customer_reviews.author: J. REED

customer_reviews.title: Leaf blwer
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this blower. Light weight, easy to use. Leaves are always caught right at the front door, which track into the house. This blower we keep in the attached garage to quickly get rid of this problem.
customer_reviews.author: Jean/Illinois

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love it! Light weight
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking at this for years and finally just bought it. Absolutely love it! Light weight, easy to handle, multiple uses from cleaning out the garage, blowing of the A/C unit and window sills, to cleaning up grass clippings. If you have other Worx tools your should add this, if not you should get this and I guarantee you will start converting all your garden and house tools soon after.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: This is the greatest hand held blower I have ever used. It has many functions as you can see. I bought for the blower only and it works well. Light weight but works well. I had two friends who bought after they tried mine. I have used the part that blows up and removes air from pool blow ups and it worked well. I bought an other battery because with constant use the battery last about 30 minutes. But we use this blower several times a week. My 6 year old grandson uses it.
customer_reviews.author: MadJac

customer_reviews.title: Utterly worthless
customer_reviews.text: This was a very regretible purchase. The power stated wasn't what we got. The battery never lasted very long. The the battery wouldn't charge any more, so ordered a double leak battery pack. The never worked either and figured it was a charger issue. But for a $67 purchase and a battery on top of that only to find out it might need a charger. Forget it. DONT WASTE YOUR MONEY. THIS WAS WORTHLESS, NO WAIT. IT WAS COSTLY!!! FINANCIALLY AND MENTALLY.
customer_reviews.author: MJ60

customer_reviews.title: this is not a super powerful blower
customer_reviews.text: it does what it is intended to do. this is not a super powerful blower, its a great little lightweight blower for light work around the yard and house. its essentially a broom with air which makes light work of annoying cleanups that you would have had to have done with a broom. I started timing the battery, it was still going strong after 10 minutes. for me its worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Satisfied Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... several pieces of equipment from this company and I love them all they're light the batteries interchange and I ...
customer_reviews.text: I have several pieces of equipment from this company and I love them all they're light the batteries interchange and I really do what they say in the fall there's lots of leaves on our street and somehow they always end up in my foyer and my front door and I just drop this couple seconds clean gone love it
customer_reviews.author: julie

customer_reviews.title: Great...while the battery lasts
customer_reviews.text: I wanted this to blow out my garage periodically while wood-working. I picked this one because it was lightweight and battery operated because of convenience and no gas fumes. That all works well as I expected. But, the battery life is very short. I would potentially buy something else just for that reason alone.
customer_reviews.author: Ginny Matthews

customer_reviews.title: A good product.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for the small jobs around the house but I must say it out performed my wildest expectations. I have three batteries but I've never needed more then one to do half of my two car garage, the double drive way, and the entire walk about the house (about 80 feet). Yes on one battery. It is light weight, easy to handle and with enough power to handle most light jobs. If your looking for heavy duty buy a gas powered unit.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Scan

customer_reviews.title: Great product for blowing out semi trailers!
customer_reviews.text: Works great! I drive a semi for a living and I bought this to blow out trailers for pickier shippers. Pushing the shop broom and fighting the edges to get the dirt out was killing my back. This little blower is a powerhouse and does a great job! I would definitely recommend this product. The battery last plenty long enough for my purposes. Also, it is very small when pulled apart/broken down which is a big plus given the lack of storage space in a semi. I would give it ten stars if I could.
customer_reviews.author: steve

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Love this blower. Yes it doesn’t last long but that’s understandable for how small the battery is. I’m able to use it for a good 10-15 minutes. I use this for in between when I don’t feel like hooking up multiple cords to use the other blower
customer_reviews.author: Beata

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money
customer_reviews.text: It’s great to have a cordless blower but the batteries just don’t last very long. I have another Worx product and that’s a good thing as I have three batteries and it still doesn’t last long enough for a big job.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Schappacher

customer_reviews.title: Great for small jobs
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for small jobs around the home and it does a fine job for my purpose. It chews up the battery pretty fast so that would be my only complaint but is fine for quick jobs
customer_reviews.author: WM8C

customer_reviews.title: Super for tiny fast blowing
customer_reviews.text: This blower works great for my purpose: blowing off leaves and cut grass from small areas like tiny deck, porch, patio. It is not for blowing leaves in your average or large yard. Each of the areas where I use this can be done in 3-5 minutes. I’ve gotten about 20 minutes maximum from a charge. I have not used any of the accessories yet. I plan to next spring. If I don’t I will junk them. Great for very small jobs that need to be done quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Dean Hampton

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I expected worked great.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I expected worked great. I find the battery works great on one area. I can do a two car garage or my horse barn or my patios. But I can’t do all three on the same charge. Ok by me, I don’t want to work that hard! And now I have a second battery for my works drill that I could not live without.
customer_reviews.author: Julie M.

customer_reviews.title: Great for quick clean up around the house
customer_reviews.text: Great for quick clean up around the house. It is lightweight and user-friendly. Only 4 stars because we would like a wall mount for the charger and/or the blower and the battery life could be longer. We will be ordering more batteries so that we can continue to use the WORX for our front and backyard (usually runs out after doing the back porch areas and the front entry way).
customer_reviews.author: ARP

customer_reviews.title: Light but powerful blower
customer_reviews.text: This ultra lightweight blower was perfect for using on my rooftop to clear tree droppings & debris. It also did a great job clearing leaves, small sticks, pine cones and needles off of my deck. The battery life could be a little longer but overall this is a terrific product. I also have the trimmer which uses the same battery. Lightweight was a must for me.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: I love this Worx...it's lightweight, easy to use and saves my back from that nasty broom...I highly recommend this...I know others has commented about the short battery life.. yes...but it does my patio and the whole breezeway before it runs down so I don't find that a problem...I just plug it back in when finished and it's ready to go the next day I need it. I, like others, suggest if you are going to be doing a lengthy job with it to buy a second battery pack.
customer_reviews.author: Ms Daisy

customer_reviews.title: Good product!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a female who had to start doing her yard... Bleh! I hated the gas blower that my husband left behind. It never worked. I wanted something that was easy and worked well enough to blow the grass clippings after mowing. So far, the Worx Air blower does the trick! No gas or motor to mess with and no electrical cord to lug around. It's lightweight and easy to handle. Power is a bit lacking, but it does what I need it to do.
customer_reviews.author: Tara M.

customer_reviews.title: Almost a toy...
customer_reviews.text: It does have a really short run time as others have said. The power gradually decreases over the 20 minute run time. It doesn't run at full tilt for 20 minutes and then just die. I was able to mostly dry off my mid-sized sedan before it ran out of juice. I bought it to keep in my camper to blow off the slide before closing it. It will work fine for that. It gets an extra star for all the attachments it came with.
customer_reviews.author: T. Moog

customer_reviews.title: Worx leaf blower
customer_reviews.text: Works pretty good, not that powerful, but blowers my grass clippings off my driveway after I mow. Wish the battery would last longer.
customer_reviews.author: Birdnutz

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight & great for moving dry debris
customer_reviews.text: Great portable blower, but don’t expect a super powerful electric blower. It works well on dry dirt, clay, leaves, hay & other barn debris, but not meant to move wet debris. Love how lightweight & compact it is and much quieter than the heavy duty blowers.
customer_reviews.author: Lainey S

customer_reviews.title: Really LOW blowing power.
customer_reviews.text: This leaf blower is really weak. My hair dryer has more horse power. Spend a little extra money and get one with more horse power. You won't regret it.
customer_reviews.author: V Rees

customer_reviews.title: WORX AIR HOORAY!!!
customer_reviews.text: Received this and got to a quick start, blew all the leaves from my driveway & yard. I have RA and this product is so light and easy to carry around. Plan on ordering the extension for the gutters soon. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice tool
customer_reviews.text: I was worried that this would not be powerful enough. It is fine for me. I am happy with my purchase and like how practical this is. I also have the power spray and they share batteries and chargers. Pleased with the brand.
customer_reviews.author: KHan

customer_reviews.title: An amazing product!
customer_reviews.text: I did something right this time. I wanted a leaf blower but my husband didn't think I needed it. He told me to get it, it was on sale and when it arrived he read about it put it together, charged it and tried it. He was amazed how well it work and had me try it. I need more practice. I would like to order another battery though! Thank you so much for a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Patti Crandall

customer_reviews.title: A great lighweight blower with a long lasting battery
customer_reviews.text: The Worx does a great job at blowing leaves off the sidewalk. It's hard to believe how lightweight it is, and the battery is also very compact with good life. The blower seems to have just about the right amount of blowing power to move the leaves without making a mess, and it's less noisy than our gas powered blower. We haven't used any of the accessories yet.
customer_reviews.author: Northeast Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Vibrates and louder than comparable blowers
customer_reviews.text: Louder than other battery powered blower. Also, when I hold blower pointed upward - to dry off top of truck after wash or blow dust off any area above - the motor vibrates as though the fan is loose. Sometimes it will do same when simply moving blower from left to right or vs versa.
customer_reviews.author: in2itively-beyond

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I use on my patios, walkways, and deck. Plenty enough power to blow debris off surfaces. So nice not to have to use a broom! Charge lasts about 20 min. Product is lightweight and sturdy. Buy this and put away your broom!
customer_reviews.author: lynn

customer_reviews.title: Make cleanup quicker
customer_reviews.text: Great tool for quick cleanup. We have an electric blower but it's heavy and the cord is always in the way! This tool is light and maneuverable. I wish I'd known, though, that it's available with a stronger battery because I live in the woods and I have a lot of leaves! Do get an extra battery and a quick charger for less frustration! It takes several hours to charge the battery with the included charger.
customer_reviews.author: Home cook

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Very flexible.
customer_reviews.text: Easily handles pine needles, twigs and small sticks, pebbles and small rocks. Light weight but powerful. Besides clearing walkways and patios and porches, I am using it to blow out my gutters, blow out dog hair and debris from kennels, and cobwebs from my 15 foot high great room ceiling.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: For the price you can't go wrong. I've used it several times and it works great. Only fault with it is the battery doesn't last long enough. But then..........either does my ambition!
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: Not as much power as expected
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping the batter would last as long as my trimmer but no. Only about 15 mins while blowing. Need something a bit stronger. This will work for those that don't have too many trees
customer_reviews.author: Kalena Graham

customer_reviews.title: It's a Lightweight with Reasonably Strong Power
customer_reviews.text: The Worx does a nice job and is very lightweight and convenient. If you're used to a gas powered blower, you may be disappointed in the lack of power in this model. However, considering its battery powered and small, it does great work sweeping our garage (dry floor only) and patio (dry only, not wet).
customer_reviews.author: Tony's Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Meets my needs.
customer_reviews.text: This blower is lightweight and has a great battery life for my purposes. Completely satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Miller

customer_reviews.title: This was truly a worthwhile purchase for me; I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome machine. I love it and I do not use it to blow leaves; I have the bigger one for that. This is excellent for small jobs and for cleaning out my car in one fell swoop. It is much easier than vacuuming. I use it for a variety of things, such as dusting hard to reach places where a vacuum won't go and high places such as ceilings and ceiling fans. Also, I use it for small jobs around my pool and patio areas.
customer_reviews.author: Florence Patricia Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent. I have an electric for years which required ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. I have an electric for years which required dragging around a cord. I think this works equally as well, weighs half as much and is a lot easier to use. Frankly I haven't used any of the attachments so not certain how practical they are but for my needs, this works perfect, whether cleaning out a garage or blowing leaves and grass off the driveway and walks.
customer_reviews.author: G-Man

customer_reviews.title: lightweight blower with serious power
customer_reviews.text: I just love this lightweight blower. Primary purpose of this one is to blow the water off our motorhome when we wash it. Much quicker than drying and great way to beat water spots. We also use it on the car and around the motorhome. I'm thinking of buying another for porches and around the house. My mom and sister both use them for that and love them.
customer_reviews.author: Grill-less on Padre Island

customer_reviews.title: Light duty blower - underpowered for most jobs.
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight / light duty - extremely underpowered. I should have done more research. Barely moves anything in the yard. Hard surfaces work a little better but don't expect anything close to an electric or gas powered or even other battery powered blowers. Huge disappointment overall but I it does come with some handy accessories for those very small jobs. Spend 50 - 100 more for the right tool for those yard jobs.
customer_reviews.author: marisol

customer_reviews.title: powerful sweeper for steps, walkways, and drive
customer_reviews.text: powerful sweeper for steps, walkways, and drive. moved away all of the grass clippings. handy to clean out the garage too. very lightweight and gives a good charge for 20-minutes of use per battery. not exactly perfect for blowing leaves in the yard. not quite enough power for that.
customer_reviews.author: Travis Tompkins

customer_reviews.title: Stay AWAY!!
customer_reviews.text: My hairdryer has more power than this junk. Stay away, the reviews are true. This barely moved dry leaves in my driveway and only ran for 10 minutes. 20 minutes out of the box and I'm sending this back.
customer_reviews.author: THOM TURNER

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: Great little machine! Perfect for cleaning off my deck and sidewalks. Battery lasts only about 10 minutes though. You have to work fast!
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: Works well for me!
customer_reviews.text: I now live in a much more limited area and this leaf blower is perfect for my needs. I've often used your edger/trimmer and found this unit just as efficient and handy.
customer_reviews.author: C. Doughty

customer_reviews.title: Easy Jobber
customer_reviews.text: We use this for cleaning debris off drive, patio, & sidewalks; it works great for light to medium tasks. perfect for our use. Quick and simple to use and charge!
customer_reviews.author: Buckeye Ollie

customer_reviews.title: OK
customer_reviews.text: It's OK. The battery runs for about 15-20 mins. Power is adequate for most uses. Not capable of blowing acorns off a lawn but does work on hard surfaces well. Fairly high velocity. You are paying for the cordless convenience which is what I wanted.. There may be better competing products. We bought the second battery.
customer_reviews.author: james f

customer_reviews.title: Light weight and lite on power.
customer_reviews.text: Like the light weight but definitely does not feel like 120mph and does not blow leaves very well unless you get up close. I would not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: Gave this as a father's day present to my husband. It is light weigh and very easy to use. I feel like the battery doesn't last a super long time. We just keep it on the charger after every use.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Not light enough to justify low power
customer_reviews.text: I am generally happy with the Word products I have. However, while this blower worked just fine, it's really under-powered, even for a cordless blower. I would give it a pass if it were light enough to justify the lack of power, but it's not *that* light, so I'd recommend something else.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia B

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and well made
customer_reviews.text: The unit is well-made with strong/thick plastic outer shell and attachments. It’s not great for a big yard with lots of leaves but it does great on the patio and blowing out the garage. I was very impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Tatom

customer_reviews.title: Great light weight blower!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have had one like this for several years and love it! I purchased this one for my son-in-law and I hope he enjoys it as much as I have enjoyed mine.
customer_reviews.author: HappyCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work for long
customer_reviews.text: I liked the blower but used it for six or seven times, now it is not charging... Too late to return??? That's a lot of money for something only used for a month...
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: The "Dust Buster" of Blowers
customer_reviews.text: Light weight. Relatively quiet. Powerful enough for small jobs. I use it on my deck and on my boat. Easier than sweeping. Easier to charge battery than to fill my gas blower. Charge lasts long enough. I have not used the OTHER attachments. Probably won't. Will not replace your gas blower, but still a good value. I'm sure it will come in handy for you.
customer_reviews.author: B. Curtis

customer_reviews.title: It really works!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the answer to "gotta work smarter, not harder"... I hardly believe how easy it was to blow the leafs off my 300' gravel driveway. I bought a second back up battery and it took both of them to power the blower through finish. The charge on the battery lasted probably 15/20 minutes. I'm so tickled, I was almost out there doing the football touchdown dance.
customer_reviews.author: Viki

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: This Worx Blower works great. It's lightweight and easy to handle. So nice to not have to deal with a long cord. Battery lasts a long time. We actually bought an extra battery in case we have large jobs. Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Rosalie Santiago

customer_reviews.title: it really helps to be able to clean the sidewalks and driveway easily and quickly
customer_reviews.text: We use this in our RV to finish up window washing by blow drying. It also works around the house. In these times of water shortages, it really helps to be able to clean the sidewalks and driveway easily and quickly. No broom necessary. A great little tool that is plenty powerful enough to do the job.
customer_reviews.author: Lou Kief

customer_reviews.title: Not a miracle machine, but.....
customer_reviews.text: I like this blower because it is lightweight and easy to handle....no cord to mess with. However, if you are expecting it to be as powerful as a gas or electric model, you are sure to be disappointed. It works fine for my usual tasks, blowing grass clippings and debris from the patio, sidewalk, and driveway, so I am happy with it, but I'm not giving up my electric one for heavier-duty jobs.
customer_reviews.author: arkie nan

customer_reviews.title: Just ok!
customer_reviews.text: Although we use this to blow leaves, I wish we had purchased a larger blower with more power. The tube mouthpiece is a bit small. We charge it up each time we use it, but sometimes while using it, it runs out of charge.
customer_reviews.author: LSOHara

customer_reviews.title: Great tool.
customer_reviews.text: This is my first "Worx" tool. Wish I hadn't waited so long. Does exactly what they advertise. Built solidly and feels good in the hands. Wish all manufacturers would put this kind of quality in their products.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!  Very happy.
customer_reviews.text: Love this!! I drive truck and it’s much easier than sweeping! I can blow out several trailer on a charge. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Pierce

customer_reviews.title: Not enough power
customer_reviews.text: Light and convenient but not enough power to blow grass off sidewalk.Overall its okay.
customer_reviews.author: global

customer_reviews.title: Ease of use
customer_reviews.text: This is a good product. It is lite, easy to aim, and carry. Battery life is average to poor. Power is fine, just remember what it is designed to do- move liter items off smoother surfaces, not clear a lawn! Highly recommended for its purpose
customer_reviews.author: shirley

customer_reviews.title: Perfect little blower
customer_reviews.text: The battery doesn’t last long. But I drive a school bus and this was perfect for blowing out the dust and dirt. You can only do one bus at a time before you must recharge the battery.
customer_reviews.author: Shooky

customer_reviews.title: A great light duty blower
customer_reviews.text: A great medium power blower. Not for the big jobs but great for blowing off walks and patios. Battery has long life but when it’s done, it’s done. It shuts off.
customer_reviews.author: pvic

customer_reviews.title: Lite easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Good product I love my WORX products but should come with 2 batteries dies to soon
customer_reviews.author: Karen Ellis

product_meta.title: WORX WG545.1 20V Max Lithium Cordless AIR Blower/Sweeper, battery included
product_meta.description: Cold weather is approaching fast and you know what that means: the race is on to tidy up and winterize the outside of your home. This fall, clean up your deck, patio, sidewalk, and garage faster and stop dust and dirt at the door with the versatile WORX AIR sweeper. With 8 different attachments, the WORX 20V AIR is the ultimate cleaning system, capable of sweeping, dusting, inflating, deflating, and even drying all sorts of things around your home. At only 3.5 pounds with no cords or smelly gas, it’s lightweight and compact so you can take it almost anywhere and clean without getting as tired. A rechargeable 20-volt MaxLithium shareable battery gives you 120 MPH (80 cfm) of sweeping power and up to 15 minutes of runtime—perfect for quickly creating a clean zone around your home. Use the flexible tube with a specially angled nose to blow debris out from under your car, lawnmower, or workbench without any heavy lifting. Or, use the attachments for auto detailing, quickly deflating pool toys, and cleaning spider webs from ceiling corners and inside windows. Because 85% of the dirt in your home is blown, tracked, or carried in from entry points like doors, garages, and decks, it’s important to maintain a regular cleaning routine around the perimeter of your house. Make the WORX AIR your secret weapon and you’ll enjoy a cleaner, cozier home all winter long.
feature_bullets: Use attachments included to create a CLEANZONE in an around your home
High blower speed handles large areas. No-load speed 12500/min
Clears hard-to-reach places, ideal for hard surfaces. Charging Time- 5 hours
Sweeps debris from shops, garages, driveways and yards
120 mph air speed with 80 cfm air flow
8 innovative attachments included for a variety of clean-up & inflating/deflating tasks
Ultra-lightweight, compact design – only 3.5 lbs so easy to use and store
Share battery across multiple WORX tools within the 20V Power Share platform

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars1,848 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
